title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: Its really junking hearing saying bitcoin has lost its values. Let me give you instance, if people reject from been a part of a club member does that makes you less human? NO. Bitcoin can never lose its values only price that deprecates on normal marketcap of cryptosystem and cryptocurrency. The figures remain same which makes the values same point, as long you keep holding, the price will definitely gets to your purchased value and gain better even where you allow your investment to grow with bitcoin, be patients and watch time counting, bitcoin will surely proves many enemies, and bring them to the club as a bitcoiner.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Tl;dr1BTC would always be equal to 1BTC

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Bitcoin's value & price aren't at all equivalent. Yet, you aren't discussing both of it. You are actually referring to a unit. Value and price move simultaneously. But the unit you bought will remain unchanged forever. Price increases along with value growth. Value refers to how widely recognized Bitcoin is, and price refers to the current market price. You can conduct further research on the value, price, and units. Hence, it will be clearer to you.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Maybe what you want to say is Value 1BTC = 1BTC and it won't change. But if you refer to changes in the value of bitcoin with other currencies, then the value of bitcoin will not be the same, there will be changes in value because Bitcoin is a digital currency that fluctuates with high volatility. This is influenced by adoption and users, market demand and new news and events that will affect the entire market.Investing in bitcoin involves a high degree of risk and no one will be held responsible for the investment you make, that is completely self-conscious. It seems you need to learn more about Bitcoin Value.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: When Bitcoin price falls, so does its purchasing power. If yesterday you could buy a house with 1 BTC, but today it's worth only half of the house, you have lost value. It doesn't matter that your loss is not realized and you can potentially get it all back, because here and now you are poorer than before.Quote from: JamesBorn on March 16, 2023, 08:15:16 PMas long you keep holding, the price will definitely gets to your purchased value and gain better even where you allow your investment to grow with bitcoin, be patients and watch time counting, bitcoin will surely proves many enemies, and bring them to the club as a bitcoiner.If you are so sure that Bitcoin will go up and up, why not sell your house and your organs and anything that can be sold to buy more Bitcoin? That's only logical if you believe that Bitcoin will 100% go up.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Just remember where value lies. You can't eat dollars, and you can't eat bitcoins. You might be able to eat gold or silver, but it would be kinda difficult to do, and probably wouldn't do you any good.Everything is money of a kind, after a fashion. One of the greatest values of bitcoin is, bitcoin is teaching people this. Many people know it already. Many of them are wealthy from understanding this. They look at the clothes on their backs, realize that it is money, and figure out how to bargain it away for better clothing.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: The Bitcoin value is always be same because there's nothing changed on the consensus and the protocol, the only changed is the price because it's depends on demand and supply. Bitcoin isn't actually used as a store of value, but it's used as a currency where you can pay anything with Bitcoin without need to ask permission from the banks. If you're scared Bitcoin price can decrease due to bear market, why you're not scared if fiat value always decrease due to inflation?

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Of course, when we are talking on the value of Bitcoin we should not equate all with its monetary price in the current cryptocurrency market. Defining value can be broad from one person to another. For example, if you have Bitcoin and the government can be running after your finances maybe to confiscate them it would be impossible for them to track your Bitcoin not unless you are volunteering to tell them. Now that is one value of Bitcoin we can rely on. The price is of course depends on a lot of factors especially demand and supply...and because Bitcoin can be excelling on these aspects no wonder some are predicting that its Bitcoin can go to the moon at the right time. And today as the world is watching the banking turmoil in USA and Europe we can see that more and more are shifting their interest to Bitcoin especially as a reliable safe haven.
